data.comment: The match has started at Audi Field.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 2, DC United are coming forward and Yamil Asad gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Toronto at Audi Field.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 5, Armando Villarreal awards DC United a goal kick.
Ola Kamara for the home team is judged to be offside.
Goal! DC United have got their heads in front thanks to a Ola Kamara strike.
In the minute 7, DC United's Ola Kamara has run offside.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Toronto.
In Washington, D.C. Toronto drive forward through Alejandro Pozuelo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 9, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for DC United, close to Toronto's area.
DC United pushes forward through Yamil Asad, whose finish on goal is saved.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, DC United have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 16, Pablo Piatti (Toronto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of DC United.
Alejandro Pozuelo grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Audi Field.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Toronto at Audi Field.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 22, DC United are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, Yamil Asad of DC United is pulled up for offside.
Nick DeLeon (Toronto) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
DC United's Gelmin Rivas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of DC United.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Toronto's Jozy Altidore attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a DC United throw-in in Toronto's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Washington, D.C..
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Junior Moreno for DC United gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Toronto have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
Toronto's Pablo Piatti has been booked in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 44, Throw-in Toronto.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Toronto are pushing forward but Jonathan Osorio's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Armando Villarreal awards DC United a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Free kick Toronto.
In the minute 45, Armando Villarreal blows to end the first-half.
Armando Villarreal has blown to start the second-half.
The home team replace Mohammed Abu with Griffin Yow.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Jozy Altidore with Ayo Akinola. This is the first substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mohammed Abu for DC United who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
At Audi Field, Toronto are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Toronto.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Important block from the DC United defence as Nick DeLeon fires in a strike for Toronto.
In the minute 58, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
DC United have a goal kick.
DC United to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 60, Toronto move into a 1-2 lead through a Ayo Akinola header.
Great play from Pablo Piatti to set up the goal.
Ola Kamara for DC United is whistled offside.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of DC United.
Richie Laryea is booked for the away team.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Toronto at Audi Field.
Kevin Paredes is on a sub for Gelmin Rivas for DC United.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a DC United throw-in in Toronto's half.
Ayo Akinola for Toronto drives towards goal at Audi Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Toronto to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Nick DeLeon of Toronto gets in a strike, but is off target.
Armando Villarreal awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Chris Mavinga is replacing Eriq Zavaleta for the away team.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to DC United.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 76, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Free kick in a good position for Toronto!
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
DC United make their fourth substitution with Federico Higuain replacing Yamil Asad.
In the minute 78, Ben Olsen is making the team's third substitution at Audi Field with Moses Nyeman replacing Julian Gressel.
In Washington, D.C. DC United's Griffin Yow is caught offside.
Kevin Paredes (DC United) has received a first yellow card.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a third substitution, with Laurent Ciman replacing Nick DeLeon.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
In the minute 85, Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Attention is being given to Toronto’s Pablo Piatti and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 87, Pablo Piatti returns to the field for Toronto after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 87, Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Erik Sorga is replacing Chris Odoi-Atsem for DC United at Audi Field.
Griffin Yow gets an equalizer for DC United. The score is now 2-2.
Free kick Toronto.
Armando Villarreal signals a Toronto throw-in in DC United's half.
At Audi Field the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Toronto.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
DC United have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
DC United to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) has taken off Pablo Piatti who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Patrick Mullins is the replacement.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a fifth substitution, with Tsubasa Endoh replacing Alejandro Pozuelo.
